Background

I'm a grad student at University of Massachusetts Amherst studying Computer Science with a concentration in Data Science. My academic interests tend to revolve around security, machine learning, computer vision, and distributed systems. I am studying Neural Networks, Computer Networks and Security and Methods of Applied Statistics in my first semester! I am currently working on a project titled, "Mitigating bias in Facial Recognition using Seldonian Framework". I've previously worked at Oracle Financial Software Services as an Associate Consultant, PhonePe as a Site Reliability Engineer Intern for their ETC Team, and Kohort, as a Design Intern.

When I'm not in classes or working, I'm probably chilling with friends, singing, brushing up on a my Korean, or crossing off another item on my bucket list. I was the lead vocalist in my band back in India. You can check out my covers on Instagram!

Other Projects
Mitigating Bias in Facial Recognition using Seldonian Framework

We aimed to address bias in facial recognition systems by utilizing the Seldonian framework to implement fairness-aware constraints. Our work involved conducting a comprehensive comparative analysis of fairness-aware models (e.g., those enhanced with Seldonian constraints) and fairness-unaware models, such as ResNet50 and VGG16. The study highlighted significant improvements in both fairness metrics and overall model performance, showcasing the potential of integrating fairness considerations into state-of-the-art facial recognition systems.

PyTorch Python Machine Learning Neural Networks
Soil Analysis and Agricultural Aid using ML and IoT

Developed soil analysis system in Karnataka using NPK, humidity, and moisture sensors. Predicted ideal crops based on sensed data using GaussianNB classifier and created an Android app for convenient access.

Flask Python Machine Learning Internet of Things
Online Pharmacy

Created an online drug store website for selling/buying products using simple PHP and MySQL queries. Designed UI and built a responsive frontend interface using HTML/CSS/JS. Developed soil analysis system in Karnataka using NPK, humidity, and moisture sensors. Predicted ideal crops based on sensed data using GaussianNB classifier and created an Android app for convenient access.

Front-End Development MySQL Relational Databases PHP
